review: This little stick is the best 35 bux I have ever spent.Google keeps updating this and it just gets better and better. For 35 bux I have replaced my cable subscription with YouTube and netflix.It also works to show your phone screen or chrome browser window. I use it to watch movies stored on my computer or phone. There are tons of video sites that support it like Daily Motion (good for foreign shows).It works amazingly well and is very reliable with an android phone. It never lags (provided internet is fast enough), and its stable. It's basically perfect.It's not quite the same thing as a roku or apple TV in that it does not store any video on itself, but it is able to play from so many sources and your local computer flawlessly so I never miss it.
